Package com.example.appointment.controller

Class ModifyAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.appointment.controller.Controller
com.example.appointment.controller.AddAppointmentController
com.example.appointment.controller.ModifyAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AddListenerInterface, AppointmentDataInterface, ComboBoxListenerInterface, GetAppointmentsInterface, SQLControllerInterface
public class ModifyAppointmentController extends AddAppointmentController
A controller that loads the Modify Appointment page allowing users to modify selected appointments from the database.

      public void saveAppointment(ActionEvent event) throws SQLConnectionDroppedException

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws SQLConnectionDroppedException
      This method is overridden because instead of adding a new appointment to the database, it needs to update the previously existing appointment value.
      Overrides:
      addAppointment in class AddAppointmentController
      Parameters:
      appointment - A passed in appointment to be added to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLConnectionDroppedException - If a SQL error occurs that disrupts the connection to the database.

      • AddAppointmentController.addAppointment(Appointment)
